name: baked-recipe-admin
description: Baked is an opinionated framework for .NET in backend and Nuxt in frontend. This is a recipe package that brings together all the components one needs for an Admin UI.
author: mouseless

scripts.build: npm run lint && nuxt-module-build build --stub && nuxt-module-build prepare
scripts.dev: npm run dev:prepare && nuxi dev playground
scripts.dev:prepare: nuxt-module-build build --stub && nuxt-module-build prepare && nuxi prepare playground
scripts.release: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run prepack && changelogen --release && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
